ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and then what they were promised comes to them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And then what they were promised comes upon them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and then the chastisement of which they were being warned were to come upon them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and then Our torment will strike them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And then the promise that is given to them, does come upon them-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And afterwards comes to them that which they had been promised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then there comes to them that with which they are threatened,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then there comes on them that they were promised,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And then cometh that which they were promised,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and then the promised punishment fell upon them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And then there cometh unto them that which they had been promised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: then there comes to them what they have been promised,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Yet there comes to them at length the (Punishment) which they were promised!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And afterwards comes to them that (punishment) which they had been promised!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and then what they were promised comes to them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then there comes to them what they were promised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And then there came to them that which they were promised?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:206] then there were to come on them that which they have been promised, of chastisement,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And then cometh that which they were promised) of punishment,
